Package org.pac4j.core.authorization.authorizer

Class ProfileAuthorizer<U extends CommonProfile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.authorization.authorizer.ProfileAuthorizer<U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authorizer<U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCheckAuthenticationAuthorizer, AbstractRequireElementAuthorizer
    public abstract class ProfileAuthorizer<U extends CommonProfile>
extends Object
implements Authorizer<U>
    Authorizer which is valid if one of the profiles is authorized or all the profiles are authorized.
    Since:
    1.9.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
